DOC.brief_summary: A Study to Assess Etoricoxib versus Diclofenac in Chinese Patients with Osteoarthritis of the Knee or Hip
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Assess Etoricoxib Versus Diclofenac in Chinese Patients With Osteoarthritis of the Knee or Hip (0663-080)(COMPLETED)
DOC.criteria: Chinese males or females at least 40 years of age with osteoarthritis of the knee or hip
